alfredsnippet.snippet:
Rethinking Childhood - Peter B. Pufall, p.10

"A new paradigm does not simply bring coherence to a field, it identifies questions that need to be asked. Some of them will be newly minted, but others will be old ones that have been newly polished, honed, and put into circulation."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - New Paradigms Identify Questions
